summary: This bill, the Securing Smart Investments in our Ports Act, aims to ensure equitable geographic distribution of projects selected under the Port Infrastructure Development Program. It amends Title 46 of the United States Code to mandate this geographic fairness in project selection, specifically impacting port and intermodal improvement programs and assistance for small inland river and coastal ports and terminals. The bill was introduced in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
